_header: Ne have thou no God buten one

CamTCC43.First Lines:
Ne haue þou no god botin onIdel oth ne suere þou
                    nonHalidai þan schalt tou iemenFadir & modir þou salt
                    quemen…
CamTCC43.Last Lines:
…Þi neiebores housis ierne þou noutNe wif ne maidin
                    ne hisaut
CamTCC43.Note: Written two lines of verse per line in the MS.
CamTCC43.Editions:
Förster,  Max. 
             “Kleine Mitteilungen zur mittelenglische Lehrdichtung, VI.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         104 (1900): 293-309: 302-3.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             English Lyrics of the XIIIth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1932: 129.
